name: Abhinav Bhatele
content: Abhinav Bhatele - University of Maryland Abhinav Bhatele Associate Professor, Department of Computer Science and UMIACS Affiliate Faculty Member, AIM (AI Institute at Maryland) and AMSC Program Director, Parallel Software and Systems Group (PSSG) University of Maryland, College Park Brendan Iribe Center for Computer Science and Engineering 8125 Paint Branch Drive, College Park, MD 20742 E-mail: IRB 5218 (301) 405-4507 Self-driven, motivated undergraduate/graduate students (studying computer science) interested in conducting research in my group should drop me an e-mail and mention some topics on the PSSG research page that might interest them. Students enrolled in the UMD science academy or professional masters of engineering programs: Do NOT e-mail me about GA/RA/TA/Grader positions. I do not have the bandwith to take on students whose major is not Computer Science.
